item.title: Access your kubernetes service from anywhere using Tailscale
item.description: I’ve recently setup a local kubernetes in my home network to play around with and one of the issues that I faced is that it is hard to access the services inside the cluster from the outside or the internet. Usually, in cloud environments like AWS you would setup an ingress-controller that will provision a load balancer for you and to expose a service to the internet, you’ll create an Ingress resource.
